package-manifest.name: Autodesk Maya
package-manifest.option:
import os import collections import json
hwprofiles = os.getenv('HWProfiles').split(';')
with open(os.getenv('ConfigPath'), 'r') as file: config_parse = file.read() config_parse = json.loads(config_parse)
for hwprofile in hwprofiles:
if hwprofile in list(config_parse.values()): for key, value in config_parse.items(): if value == hwprofile: config_name = key configurations[config_name] = collections.OrderedDict() configurations[config_name]['device'] = hwprofile else: config_name = hwprofile configurations[config_name] = collections.OrderedDict() configurations[config_name]['device'] = config_parse[hwprofile]

import os import collections filters = os.getenv('TestsFilter').split(';') for filter in filters: config_name = filter configurations[config_name] = collections.OrderedDict() configurations[config_name]['filter'] = filter

import os import collections tools = os.getenv('Tool').split(';') for tool in tools: config_name = tool configurations[config_name] = collections.OrderedDict() configurations[config_name]['path'] = "C:\Program Files\Autodesk\Maya{}\\bin\maya.exe".format(tool)
